meta.name: Inside the Arrest
meta.description: Inside the Arrest captures the moment of arrest, conducted more than two thousand times a day by British police, in order to investigate or prevent a crime. The arrest is the start point for every story, a high-stakes moment that can be met with anything from violence to defiance, confession to incredulity.Each episode features two cases using police bodycam footage to analyse some notorious and high-profile arrests from recent years.

videos.title: The Runaway Heiress
videos.overview: An aristocrat goes on the run with her partner and baby in the depths of winter. Police fear the child won't survive, and race to find her.

videos.title: Losing Control
videos.overview: An affair is exposed, ending in tragedy. Police arrest the suspect and discover the killer's cover-up. Plus, how an arrest solves two crimes at once.

videos.title: A Deadly Secret
videos.overview: It's only when 35-year-old Virginia McCullough is arrested at her home for the murder of her parents that officers discover her gruesome secret.

videos.title: Protecting Holly
videos.overview: A plot to kidnap TV presenter Holly Willoughby is discovered when an undercover cop in the US spots something suspicious in an online chat room.

videos.title: A Shot in the Dark
videos.overview: After a nine-year-old girl is caught in the crossfire of a gangland feud, a specialist weapons team moves in to arrest her killer.

videos.title: Killers on the Run
videos.overview: The discovery of a murdered schoolgirl leads to an international manhunt, and the dramatic arrest of her father and stepmother on an airport runway.

videos.title: Hunting The Rioters
videos.overview: After the murders of three schoolgirls, riots break out across Britain. Police are outnumbered but then use cameras to hunt down and arrest rioters.

videos.title: In the Line of Fire
videos.overview: Armed officers confront a crazed gunman at his home, then discover his terrifying plans to carry out a mass shooting at a school and police station.
